𒁔 𒐀𐎍𒑊 BUR2 SUN5 𒌓 ≈ 𒑊𒁹 PAR … 𒑊𐎍

𒁄 ≈ 𒆰 = 𒊮𒁄𒁄 šabalbal "descendent"

𒁄 BAL / PAL

𒁄 balak פלך פֶּלֶך pélekh #pilaqqu "spindle"
𒁄 •ball of eye 𒐀𒅆𒑱
𒁄 BAL ⇔ BÚR 𒁔
𒁄 BAL ⇔ KUL 𒆰
𒁄 bal kulₓ ball ≈ Kugel 𒁄 BAL libate free *preyH reverse
𒁄 BAL 𒆠 bal.que (and you libate)
𒁄 BAL 𒆠 •beliquor
𒁄 BAL 𒌑 falter, change

𒁄 BAL < 𒁀 baʳ paʳ ܚܦܪ ħpar 𒁀𒀠 paʳal փորել pʿorel 𒁄 𒀡 𒀦 𒄫𒂖 peʳel "dig" <> bury bergen

𒁄 BAL in 𒋗𒁄 šu'bala #šupêlu "change" 𒁄 BAL <> bállō in 𒋗𒁄 μεταβάλλω metabállō "change" mettre en place de 𒁄 BAL <> bar in 𒋗𒁄 chambar "change" 𒁄 BAL <> बदलना badalnā 𒋗𒁄 "change" 𒁄 BAL βάλλω change <> 𒀲𒁄 anše-bala ᵒˢ replacement donkey 𒁄 BAL •place 𒀲𒁄 anšebala ἀνθυπαλλάσσω anthupallássō αναπληρώνω anapliróno

𒁄 bala ≈ ফাল phal πλευρό plevró in 𒋾𒁄 TIʳbala turn sideways <> plow plough < фарс < persiat?

𒁄 BAL ⇔ bull in 𒁄𒁄𒍝 brüllen 𒁄 BAL ⇔ bull in 𒀚𒁄 boshaft boosheid ferg ბრაზი brazi Furor “anger, wrath” <> *peik- pyktis piktums <> foe

𒁄 BAL < BAR < PER in 𒁄𒁄 barullo brouhaha bruch brut "noise" 𒁄𒁄 𒍝 boucan brüllen ⇔ bull
𒁄𒁄 перепра́ва perepráva 𒃻𒁄𒁄 bridge, crossing

𒁄 ≈ 𒐀𒁹𒑊 ≈ 𒋡𒑊 ≈ 𒋰𒁹𒑊 ≈ 𒄞 GUD cattle

𒁄 pal < par in

𒁄𒄩 pal-ḫa pale peur fear 怕 pà(hai)

𒅁𒁄𒆍 ip-pal-kit •yberget forget

𒅁𒁄 ʳIB.BAL™ revolt

𒁄𒄭𒅖 palḫis "wide, broad" plato platt planar flat

𒌒 orb⇔ball 𒁄
𒌒𒁄𒆷 arballu sieve

𒁄𒄩 pal-ḫa peur fear
𒉺𒆷𒄷 pa-la-ḫu •pale “revere, to fear”
𒉺𒆷𒄷 pa-ra-ḫu ⋍ fear ভয় bhôẏ

𒅁𒁄 ib-pal abfall "fall/fell"
